turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you get me latta from starbucks please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, do you want me to go to the commerce location or town center?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: town center would be great. Also, I need you to order lunch for the employee meeting today

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, where do you want to get the pizza from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's do the local pizza place sliced. There is a card on file. I think we need pizza'a

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what kind should we order? Is anyone vegan?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, lets get a cheese pizza, veggie and meat lovers

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, thats one cheese, one veggie and one meat?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes, that should good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you want to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes, get some garlic sauce and ranch dressing, maybe some cheese sticks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So, we are getting three pizzas, sauce and cheese sticks? okay, I'll call them now

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thank you! also, get drinks for everyone

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, I will charge it to the company card and we are ordering from sliced. Yes, that is correct

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you! hey, add one more pizza. I like their philly cheese pizza

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, adding one more pizza to the order

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome, I called and the order is completed, we can pick it up in minutes or have it delivered

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please pick up the food

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will head out in to get there so I can get back and it will still be hot.
